org.bladerunnerjs.model

Interface AssetContainer

  • All Superinterfaces:
    BRJSNode, Node
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    BrowsableNode, BundlableNode, JsLib
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractAssetContainer, AbstractBrowsableNode, AbstractBundlableNode, AbstractComponent, AbstractJsLib, AppJsLib, AppSdkJsLib, Aspect, Blade, Bladeset, BladesetWorkbench, BladeWorkbench, BRSdkTestPack, DefaultAspect, DefaultBladeset, DefaultTestPack, SdkJsLib, TestPack, Workbench

    public interface AssetContainer
extends BRJSNode
    Represents a location that can contain assets (src or resources) such as an Aspect, Blade or Workbench.
